summary.text: Backend-focused Full-Stack / Platform Engineer with 2 years of experience building distributed, cloud-native systems at scale. Skilled in Go, TypeScript/Node.js, React, PostgreSQL, and AWS-driven DevOps. Built systems handling 75k req/min, cut P95 latency 95%, and automated pipelines reducing deploy times by 75%. Strong interest in low-latency data paths, observability, and developer-first tooling.

categories.title: Languages
categories.items: Go, TypeScript, JavaScript, Java, Python, SQL, Bash

categories.items: Node.js, Express, Fastify, NestJS, gRPC, REST, GraphQL

categories.title: Databases
categories.items: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MSSQL, Prisma ORM, Strapi CMS, Sanity, Firestore

categories.title: Cloud & DevOps
categories.items: AWS (S3, EC2, Lambda, RDS, CloudWatch), Docker, Kubernetes, Redis, Kafka, Nginx, Bazel, Gerrit, GCP (Cloud Run, Cloud Functions)

experience.title: Software Development Engineer - I
achievements: Repaired 80k+ faulty PDV records out of 150k and stabilised ingestion of 17k+ lab reports/week, ensuring full data completeness for medical sanity checks.
Resolved 900+ weekly document reupload failures, unblocking accurate creation of 300+ post-hospital forms every week across care-manager workflows.
Refactored core frontend modules for true parallel data loading, improving render times by ~25% and enhancing stability across high-traffic screens.

positions.title: SDE-I
achievements: Automated vehicle onboarding using plate-detection and dynamic flow control (15-screen engine); reduced manual effort 60% and onboarding errors 80%.
Rolled out a redesigned ticketing workflow for delayed orders; boosted customer satisfaction and reduced cancellations by 80%.
Migrated internal maps to Google Maps, lowering operating costs by 25% across logistics tooling.
Automated syncing of ~1M tickets with a Python-based pipeline, removing 95% of manual ops work for the team.

positions.title: Software Development Intern
achievements: Migrated 200+ legacy JS components to TypeScript + Redux within a Next.js monorepo; reduced build-time errors 40% and improved dev velocity 30%.
Built a production-safe Go streaming SDK to pipe multi-GB ZIP archives directly into S3; cut transfer latency 65% and halved memory usage.
Developed a GPS ingestion service handling ~50k messages/s with live dashboards; improved ETA prediction accuracy by 12%.
Refactored RPC and service-to-service communication with goroutines and gRPC batching; slashed P95 latency by 95% at 2k TPS.

experience.title: Backend Developer Intern
achievements: Scaled a Strapi-based ERM from mid-load to ~1k RPS; in-memory caching and SQL tuning lifted throughput by 80%.
Containerised microservices with Docker on AWS EC2; reduced CI/CD times by 75% and cut infra spending by 63%.
Redesigned React component structure; reduced unnecessary re-renders by 40% and kept First Input Delay < 50ms.

experience.title: Full-Stack Web Developer Intern
achievements: Developed a Next.js backend for the UP Commercial Tax Dept., handling 75k req/min using JWT + HTTPOnly auth and WAF protections.
Optimised MSSQL workloads using indexes + stored procedures, reducing query latency 95% and CPU use 90%.
Automated PDF-based discrepancy reports using PDFMake & Mammoth, eliminating 60% of manual formatting effort.

projects.name: codeCollab
projects.description: Real-time collaborative IDE built with Next.js, WebSockets, and OT; supports 20+ concurrent users with conflict-free syncing.

projects.description: AI-powered exam-proctoring using TensorFlow + MediaPipe; lowered false positives by 30% with smart rule pipelines.

projects.description: TypeScript implementations of classic ML/search algorithms including K-Means, GA, and A* with visual demos.

projects.name: Pixel Drawing Simulator
